UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AcceleratedShareRepurchasesInitialPriceP.label: Accelerated Share Repurchases, Initial Price Paid Per Share
AcceleratedShareRepurchasesInitialPriceP.description: The price paid per share to immediately purchase the targeted number of shares on the date of executing the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Other Related Parties, Current
DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

AmortizationOfLeasedAsset.label: Amortization of Leased Asset
AmortizationOfLeasedAsset.description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized leases. This element may apply to energy companies that lease mineral producing properties and to other enterprises that capitalize property, plant, or equipment obtained through capital leases.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount1.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Amount
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount1.description: "The value of the financial instrument(s) that the original debt is being converted into in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DefinedBenefitPlanFundedPercentage.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded Percentage
DefinedBenefitPlanFundedPercentage.description: Percentage of plan assets to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Customer Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for a current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Contingently Issuable Shares
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of contingently issuable shares. Contingently issuable shares are those shares that are issuable for little or no cash contingent on certain conditions being met.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

OfferingCostsPartnershipInterests.label: Offering Costs, Partnership Interests
OfferingCostsPartnershipInterests.description: Costs incurred in connection with the offering and selling of additional partner interest.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received Per Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

StockOptionExercisePriceDecrease.label: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Decrease
StockOptionExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

AdvancesOnInventoryPurchases.label: Advances on Inventory Purchases
AdvancesOnInventoryPurchases.description: Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Shares Issued
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: Number of shares issued pursuant to the terms of a deferred compensation arrangement.

InterestAndOtherIncome.label: Interest and Other Income
InterestAndOtherIncome.description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedP.label: Origination of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedP.description: The cash outflow for a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.label: Payments for Advance to Affiliate
PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfWarrants.label: Payments for Repurchase of Warrants
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfWarrants.description: The aggregate amount paid by the entity to reacquire the right to purchase equity shares at a predetermined price, usually issued together with corporate debt.

ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.label: Proceeds from (Payments to) Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.label: Repayment of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.label: Salary and Wage, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer and officer employees. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Issued in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

AccumulatedCapitalizedInterestCosts.label: Accumulated Capitalized Interest Costs
AccumulatedCapitalizedInterestCosts.description: Amount of accumulated interest costs capitalized as part of property, plant and equipment cost basis.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.description: Amount of direct write-downs of accounts receivable charged against the allowance.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPayment.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPayment.description: Amount of the required periodic payments including both interest and principal payments.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

GainOnCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness.label: Gain on Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
GainOnCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness.description: The gain recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposit Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in moneys or securities given as security including, but not limited to, contract, escrow, or earnest money deposits, retainage (if applicable), deposits with clearing organizations and others, collateral, or margin deposits.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Benefit Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued, Value, Stock Options Exercised, Net of Tax Benefit (Expense)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options, after deduction of related income tax (expense) benefit.
